entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
